## [Category 1]

## Constitution Compliance (Mandatory)

- [ ] CHK100 Pagination enforced on listing endpoints (default limit=20; `MAX_ITEMS`; reject `limit > MAX_ITEMS`)
- [ ] CHK101 Query validation is strict; sort/filter fields are allowlisted; invalid values return 400 with stable codes
- [ ] CHK102 DTO/serialization prevents internal/sensitive field exposure
- [ ] CHK103 Standard error contract enforced everywhere (errorId, code, requestId, etc.)
- [ ] CHK104 requestId present in responses + structured logs; warn/error logs include it
- [ ] CHK105 Rate limiting configured (global + sensitive routes) and verified
- [ ] CHK106 Health endpoints present (/health, /health/live, /health/ready) and readiness checks dependencies
- [ ] CHK107 Docker-only test execution verified (e2e baseline where applicable)
